articles.title: Quikverse's one of a kind gas station is now open, five years of construction complete
articles.author: Taylor Brooks
articles.summary: Quikverse has opened its doors, introducing a new gas station and convenience store featuring a "starlet canopy." The company prioritizes customer experience and aims to create a unique environment. While some finishing touches like signage are still needed, Quikverse is focusing on customer interaction.

articles.title: Review: Chinese brand Jaecoo delivers with frugal, feature-packed J7 SHS
articles.author: Imran Salie
articles.summary: Jaecoo launched the J7 SHS, a new plug-in hybrid version of their J7 SUV, in South Africa. The J7 SHS features a turbocharged 1.5l engine plus electric motor, offers a 1,200km driving range, and has a 18.3 kWh battery capable of 90km of driving. It retails at R689,900.

articles.title: Window Genie relocates to office space in New Braunfels
articles.author: Maddy Morales
articles.summary: Window Genie provides various services, including window cleaning and pressure washing. They also offer window tinting and holiday lighting services.

articles.title: Lidl sets July 25 opening for new NJ supermarket
articles.author: Kimberly Redmond
articles.summary: Lidl US is launching its newest supermarket in Hackensack, New Jersey, on July 25. The 23,250-square-foot store, located at 150 River St., will offer fresh produce, meat, bakery items, and household products at low prices, operating daily from 8 a.m. to 9 p.m.

articles.title: 'Jake the Rizzbot' charms Austin with cowboy drip and Gen Z slang
articles.author: Aamir Khollam
articles.summary: Unitree Robotics is testing its Unitree G1 model, named 'Jake the Rizzbot,' in Austin, Texas. Jake the Rizzbot is an 'AI avatar' trained through deep reinforcement learning and simulation. It interacts with the public, showcasing the capabilities of AI and robotics in public spaces.

articles.title: GACB Sathorn Experience Center and GAC Thailand Battery Service Center Launch in Bangkok Sathorn
articles.author: Siamnews Pr
articles.summary: GAC launched its flagship Sathorn Experience Center in Bangkok and introduced the upgraded AION UT model in Thailand. The AION UT secured over 4,500 orders. GAC also established a comprehensive overseas expansion model under its 'One GAC 2.0' strategy.

articles.title: CarExpert Choice winner: Best Affordable Mid-Size Car
articles.author: Carexpert.com.au
articles.summary: Toyota Camry features a new drivetrain as its only option. This drivetrain provides improved fuel economy, refinement, and responsiveness compared to petrol-powered rivals.

articles.title: Shoppers are racing to B&M for Molly-Mae's latest collection & there are some incredible scents for less than a fiver
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Molly-Mae Hague collaborated with Persil to launch a new laundry product line, stocked at B&M, which includes washing pods and scent boosters with the "Pure Heaven Scent". B&M also offers a deeply discounted Goodmans alarm clock with QI wireless charging.

articles.title: Shoppers are racing to B&M for Molly-Mae's latest collection & there are some incredible scents for less than a fiver
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Molly-Mae Hague has collaborated with Persil to launch a "Pure Heaven Scent" laundry collection, now available at B&M. Additionally, B&M is selling a Goodmans alarm clock with QI wireless charging at a reduced price of 10p.

articles.title: Shoppers are racing to B&M for Molly-Mae's latest collection & there are some incredible scents for less than a fiver
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: B&M launched a new laundry collection in collaboration with Molly-Mae Hague, featuring Persil washing pods, Persil Non-Bio Wonder Wash, and Comfort scent boosters. Additionally, B&M is selling a Goodmans alarm clock with QI wireless charging for a drastically reduced price.

articles.title: Changhong Unveils Smart Living Innovations at 2025 Jakarta Expo, Bringing AI-Driven Appliances to Indonesian Homes
articles.summary: Changhong introduced AI-driven smart home appliances at the 2025 Jakarta International Expo, including AI Ultra-Slim Wallpaper Art TV, LightChase AI TV, Power safe Pro AI Air Conditioner, M Fresh Life AI Refrigerator, and Blue Oxygen Washing and Drying Set. The company's Shopee collaboration offers flash auctions, spin wheels, and vouchers for these products.

articles.title: ghd Helios Hair Dryer which 'dries hair in minutes' available at a discount
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: ghd's Helios Hair Dryer is currently on sale for £139, reduced from £179. The Helios Hair Dryer blasts hair in minutes without causing heat damage. The hairdryer features a 'bespoke acoustic system to ensure low sound levels'.

articles.title: I Tried 3 Popular Volume Sprays, but Only 1 Gave Me the Best Blowout of My Life
articles.author: Danielle Murphy
articles.summary: The reviewer tested Amika, K18, and Olaplex volumizing hair sprays. Amika spray stands out for its superior volume enhancement and innovative delivery system, making it a top choice for achieving lifted and bouncy hair. Olaplex spray provides a glossy sheen and is suitable for touch-ups between washes.

articles.title: Next's white dress is incredibly flattering and looks super expensive
articles.author: Shauna Bannon Ward
articles.summary: Next is introducing the Lipsy White Textured Mini V-Neck Puff Ball Short Sleeve 100% Cotton Dress, which features a textured design, flattering V-neck, puff ball sleeves, and is available in sizes 6-18. River Island offers the White Polka Dot Frilled Mini Beach Dress, available in sizes XS-L.

articles.title: Adidas Powerphase: YEEZY Connection & Revival
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Adidas is re-releasing the Powerphase sneaker, originally launched in 1987. The Powerphase will be available in new colorways, including 'Alumina', 'Sand Strata', 'Blanch Cargo', and 'Night Cargo' versions, and sold on Adidas.com.

articles.title: Cantu Celebrates Dual Recognition as 2025 Shop TODAY Beauty Award Winner
articles.author: Cantu
articles.summary: Cantu Beauty's Cantu Weightless Shampoo and Cantu Weightless Conditioner received recognition in the Shop TODAY 2025 Beauty Awards. This recognition reinforces Cantu's position as a leading brand for accessible hair care products.

articles.title: Cantu Celebrates Dual Recognition as 2025 Shop TODAY Beauty Award Winner
articles.author: Cantu
articles.summary: Cantu Beauty's Cantu Weightless Shampoo and Cantu Weightless Conditioner have won the Shop TODAY 2025 Beauty Awards. This recognition solidifies Cantu's position as a provider of high-performing hair care products for textured hair.

articles.title: When is Prime Day 2025? When does it end? What to know about Amazon's annual sale
articles.author: Haadiza Ogwude
articles.summary: Amazon is launching 'Today's Big Deals,' offering daily themed drops with exclusive deals for Prime members. Discounts up to 30% will be available on Amazon brands, including school supplies, household essentials, and summer fashion. Amazon Prime has also relaunched its young adults membership, offering a six-month free trial for individuals ages 18-24.

articles.title: How Phlur Is Reshaping The World Of Modern Fragrance
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Phlur, a company experiencing viral success on TikTok, aims to disrupt and redefine the fragrance category. This suggests a new product or service approach is intended.

articles.title: Morsels from Middle-earth
articles.author: Covering Arts
articles.summary: Erika Erikson opened Erickson's Second Breakfast Stand, a shop offering homemade jams, body care products, and sourdough bread. The shop introduces limited-edition flavors like lemon poppyseed loaves. The shop also uses a Ring doorbell system for security.

articles.title: All The Best Fourth Of July Sex Toy Deals
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: Mystery Vibe is offering 30% off on its Legato Vibrator, designed for 360-degree stimulation. Womanizer provides 30% off on the Premium Eco, an eco-friendly version of their air-pulsing vibrator. Vush is offering 40% off a rose bullet vibrator, while WeVibe provides 20% off a couples vibrator set. Lovers offers 20% off a dual-ended penis stroker toy. Le Wand is offering 40% off its powerful vibrator with versatile wand heads. Lovehoney is offering 29% off a travel-size rechargeable clitoral stimulator, while biird provides 30% off its Forbidden Fruit vibrator. Additionally, b-Vibe offers 62% off a tie-dye vibrating butt plug, and Hustler Hollywood provides 50% off a rabbit vibe.

articles.title: Microsoft Confirms Xbox Handheld Console - Official Release Set for 2025
articles.author: Paolo Villanueva
articles.summary: Microsoft unveiled the ROG Xbox Ally, a gaming handheld developed in partnership with ASUS sub-brand ROG. It features access to Xbox Game Pass and comes in two models: a base model with 16GB RAM and 512GB storage, and an X model with 24GB RAM, 1TB storage, a better processor, and a larger battery. The device, compatible with PC games and other game launchers like Steam, is set to launch at the end of the year.

articles.title: Samsung Folding Phone Leaks: Price & Frame Details
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its Galaxy Z Series on July 9, 2025, featuring the Galaxy Z Flip 7, Fold 7, and a potential trifold smartphone. The new phones boast improved displays, next-generation processors, and advanced camera systems, with the trifold model possibly featuring a titanium frame. Pre-order bonuses, including trade-in programs and bundled accessories, are expected.

articles.title: SUPPURU Launches Vegan Skincare Collection Redefining K-Beauty for Gen Z
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A new Korean skincare brand has launched vegan beauty products. The brand focuses on clean formulations, transparency, and Gen Z values, appealing to a new generation of consumers.

articles.title: Boxer Jake Paul unveils new men's care line on Amazon
articles.author: Christopher Murray
articles.summary: Jake Paul launched 'W by Jake Paul,' a new men's care line featuring vitamin-infused formulas. The product line includes body sprays, antiperspirants, body wash, face wash, hair gel, pomade, bar soap, shampoo, and conditioner, all designed with natural ingredients and various scents. Amazon Prime members can purchase these items.

articles.title: New Day Car Wash brings its services to Hwy 280
articles.author: Tyler Raley
articles.summary: New Day Car Wash, a company with existing locations in Birmingham's surrounding areas, has launched a new location along U.S. Highway 280. This new car wash, the largest among its locations, offers four wash packages: Basic ($15/month), Classic ($20/month), Deluxe ($25/month), and Signature ($30/month), with monthly memberships available for an additional $5.

articles.title: 29 Travel Products You'll Probably Wish You Had 10 Trips Ago
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of travel products such as the AirFly Pro wireless transmitter for connecting Bluetooth headphones on flights, the Beis backpack designed for travel, and the LeakLocks Toiletry Skins to prevent spills in luggage.  It also mentions the Gillette on-the-go razor as a space-saving alternative to disposable razors and a 3-in-1 foldable wireless charging pad for charging multiple devices at once.

articles.title: Beauty Buzz: The 3 best beauty products we tried this week from L'Oreal, Jouviance and Briogeo
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Jouviance, a Canadian skin-care company, has launched a gel-cream moisturizer featuring Vitamin C, peptides, and niacinamide. The brow pen is also introduced with super-simple way to fill in and shape brows, fine-tipped applicator and long-wearing eyebrow pen that promises to be 'waterproof, sweatproof and heatproof

articles.title: Beauty Buzz: The 3 best beauty products we tried this week from L'Oreal, Jouviance and Briogeo
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Jouviance launched a gel-cream moisturizer featuring Vitamin C, peptides, and niacinamide designed to renew radiance and smooth fine lines. Additionally, a hydrating hair mask formulated for fine-to-medium hair was launched, featuring acai extract and passion fruit oil to hydrate and add shine. The eyebrow pen promises to be 'waterproof, sweatproof and heatproof.'

articles.title: Best LG washing machines for small, medium, and large capacities
articles.author: Stuart Pritchard
articles.summary: LG is introducing the MAX F2Y508WBLN1 washing machine, featuring an A-10% energy efficiency rating, 14 wash programs including AI wash and LG Steam for bacteria removal, and a user-friendly LED display. The machine operates at a low noise level of 71dB and offers various options like half load, intensive wash, and pre-wash.

articles.title: This 'disgustingly satisfying' detailing pen is great for cleaning earbuds — and it's on sale for $10 on Amazon
articles.author: Kayla Kuefler
articles.summary: Hyashee introduced a 3-in-1 cleaning pen designed for cleaning earbuds and other tech devices. The pen features a flocking sponge, a gentle brush, and a metal tip for thorough cleaning without damage. It is available for purchase on Amazon.

articles.title: Summer skin care tips with Venita Aspen
articles.author: Caitlin Rogers
articles.summary: Olay Body and Secret have launched new summer-themed, limited-edition scents in their skin-benefiting products. Olay's Intensely Hydrating body wash features a blend of niacinamide, pro-glycerin, lipids, and a hyaluronic acid serum complex. Secret offers Clinical Strength Antiperspirant and Deodorant in Strawberry, Mandarin, and Watermelon scents as part of the Summer Fizz collection.

articles.title: I tried Mizzen+Main's comfortable work clothes and they've taken the hassle out of dressing for the office
articles.author: Beau Hayhoe
articles.summary: Mizzen+Main offers comfortable and versatile menswear, including the Ellis Oxford, Navy Halyard Dress Shirt, Leeward Short-Sleeve Shirt, Helmsman 5-Pocket Pants and Upton Chinos. These items feature performance fabrics with moisture-wicking, stretch and wrinkle-free qualities designed for office and casual wear. The Leeward line includes modern fabric in long and short sleeve designs.

articles.title: McDonald's Just Added a Brand-New Burger to Their Menu -- And Fans Couldn't Be Happier
articles.author: Richard Chachowski
articles.summary: McDonald's has introduced the Daily Double Burger nationwide starting June 26, 2025. The burger features double patties, cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, onions, and mayonnaise, differentiating it from other McDonald's offerings. It will also be featured in the McValue Meal Deal until the end of 2025.

articles.title: What Is PropellerAds Lead And How Can It Boost Your Online Marketing S
articles.summary: PropellerAds facilitates lead generation through its ad network, allowing advertisers to optimize campaigns for lead acquisition by directing traffic to landing pages and encouraging specific user actions. The platform provides various ad formats, targeting tools, and features like SmartCPA bidding, enabling businesses to generate leads across over 195 countries efficiently.

articles.title: We tested the new AI browser – and it might make you leave Google Chrome
articles.author: YINON BEN SHUSHAN
articles.summary: The Browser Company introduced Dia, a new browser feature. Dia is a smart chat integrated into the browser that allows users to summarize web pages, ask questions, and improve efficiency.

articles.title: mimik and Tech Mahindra Unveil a Pioneering Agentic AI Production Center
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tech Mahindra and mimik have partnered to launch the Agentic AI Production Center, which will design, develop, deploy, and commercialize agentic AI systems. This center facilitates the building of agentic-native workflows mimicking real-world business operations across various devices, leveraging mimik's Device-First Continuum AI Execution Fabric and Tech Mahindra's engineering expertise.

articles.title: Hisense Showcases AI Technology Strength with "AI YOUR LIFE" Message at FIFA Club World Cup 2025™  Jun. 30, 2025 17:00
articles.summary: Hisense is showcasing its AI leadership, featuring the Hi-View AI Engine X, an AI processor optimizing picture and sound for ULED AI TVs. Hisense expands smart connectivity in the home through ConnectLife, with AI-guided cooking and personalized laundry care, including the PureFlat Smart Series refrigerator.

articles.title: China Mobile monetises one of the world's most advanced 5G networks
articles.author: Global Data Technology
articles.summary: China Mobile Shanghai has deployed its 5G-Advanced (5G-A) network, offering multiple tiers of service plans including platinum and gold tiers with guaranteed network performance. The company is expanding its 5G-A network by analyzing user behavior and demographics to identify areas for upgrades, focusing on high-ARPU users and heavy network demand areas. China Mobile aims to monetize the new network technology by tracking and managing the experience of premium users.

articles.title: Leonardtown - The Town of Leonardtown is Going Mobile with Our New App, Hello Leonardtown
articles.summary: Leonardtown launched a new mobile app called Hello Leonardtown. The app provides news, events, service updates, and important links to the town's website. It's available for download on the Apple App Store and Google Play Store.

articles.title: One Fan, Endless Comfort! Here Are 5 Ways The Shark FlexBreeze Fan Sparks Everyday Joy
articles.author: Jeremy Ng
articles.summary: SharkNinja, a global leader in lifestyle solutions, is officially entering the Malaysian retail scene in 2023 with its Shark and Ninja brands. The Shark brand offers home solutions, while the Ninja brand focuses on kitchen solutions. The FlexBreeze Fan is a new product that is part of the Shark line-up.

articles.title: Alibaba unveils upgraded Qwen VLo model with image generation capabilities: How it works
articles.summary: Alibaba Group has introduced an upgraded version of its AI system, Qwen VLo, designed for generating and editing images using text or visual prompts. This enhanced model supports text-to-image and image-to-image creation with features like 'progressive generation', expanding the capabilities of the Qwen product line. The move is part of Alibaba's broader pivot towards artificial intelligence, with the company heavily investing in AI development through its Qwen brand.

articles.title: SUPPURU Launches Vegan Skincare Collection Redefining K-Beauty for Gen Z
articles.summary: SUPPURU, a new Korean skincare brand, has launched its first product line, Mesohemp, featuring vegan and clean beauty products. The line includes a brightening serum, calming cream, balancing toner, sunscreen, and hydrating mask, all made with organic hemp seed oil and other natural ingredients. The brand targets Gen Z consumers, emphasizing transparency, sustainability, and a minimalist approach to skincare.

articles.title: Fishers Company To Launch At-Home Hearing Aid Dryers
articles.summary: Redux is launching three new products: Ultra Dry and Charge, Dry Buddy, and Dry Buddy Mini, which dry and charge hearing aids simultaneously. Ultra Dry and Charge costs $300 and charges hearing aids as they dry. The Dry Buddy, a portable device, sells for $90 and charges both wireless earbuds and hearing aids, while the Dry Buddy Mini costs $45 and uses disposable components. All three products are manufactured in Indiana and are available on Amazon and Redux's website.

articles.title: Six New Phones Set To Arrive In July
articles.summary: Nothing Phone is releasing its 3rd edition on July 1. The new phone features a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED screen, a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 processor, and a 5,150mAh battery.

articles.title: NFTE Launches AI-Powered Entrepreneurship Program for Homeschool and School Choice Learners
articles.author: Network
articles.summary: The Network for Teaching Entrepreneurship (NFTE) is launching 'Next Level Startup,' a new online learning experience. This program is designed to help students learn entrepreneurship using AI tools and provides a flexible, project-based learning experience. Key features include personalized support, AI integration, and access to industry mentors.

articles.title: OpenAI CEO提醒：ChatGPT非万能，用户需谨慎对待AI技术
articles.author: 编辑：快讯团队
articles.summary: OpenAI is enhancing ChatGPT with features like 'persistent memory' and exploring a potential 'ad-supported model'. OpenAI's CEO acknowledges that users should remain cautious, given the possibility of inaccuracies and potential privacy concerns, while also stating that the future system requires more intelligent hardware.

articles.title: 63 Beauty Products So Good, You'll Do Surgery On The Packaging To Get Every Last Drop
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for 24-hour hydration and Super Cream with Sunscreen SPF 30 with collagen and niacinamide to target fine lines and dark spots. E.l.f. introduced Soft Glam Foundation with buildable full coverage, Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, and Halo Glow Liquid Filter with hyaluronic acid and squalane for a lit-from-within glow. Essence's introduced Lash Princess mascara for extensions-level results, Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops for fake the sunshine look, and "What the Fake!" Plumping Lip Filler for pout a fuller look.

articles.title: I'm a washing machine engineer who has fixed thousands: Here's the models I'd buy myself - and the popular makes you should avoid
articles.author: Towalne
articles.summary: Experts recommend Miele and Bosch washing machines for their reliability and longevity, with Miele models lasting up to 20 years and Bosch being a value-for-money choice. The article also advises against budget models from brands like Hotpoint and Indesit, highlighting potential issues with their durability. The article highlights a few models from each company like Miele WEA125WCS, Bosch WAN28259GB, Indesit Water Balance + MTWC 71252, Hotpoint Anti-Stain NSWR 7469 WK, Samsung Series 5+ WW90T554DAWW and LG F4X7011TBB.

articles.title: Lidl Opening Fourth Bergen County Store: Here's When And Where
articles.summary: Lidl US is opening a new location in Hackensack on July 25th, featuring wallet-friendly prices, European imports, and a 'Midl of Lidl' aisle with surprise items. The store offers fresh items like 49-cent croissants and specialty meats, along with app-only deals through the MyLidl app.

articles.title: Jennifer Aniston Loves These No-Show Socks — Get the Lookalike
articles.author: Savannah Born
articles.summary: Penuup is launching Ondo No-Show Socks for \$9 on Amazon. Gigi Hadid collaborated with Havaianas to launch the Gigi Hadid x Havaianas flip-flops.

articles.title: Summer 2025 has dozens of new snacks, including some patriotic ones for July 4th
articles.author: Kara Van Dooijeweert
articles.summary: Pringles introduced limited-edition Beer Can Chicken, Grilled Beer Brat and Beer-Braised Steak flavors. Takis launched Nacho Xplosion variety. Kellogg's Raisin Bran now features blueberry granola clusters. Chips Ahoy released ice cream sandwich flavored cookies, while M&M's introduced peanut butter ice cream sandwiches. Prime released a peach flavored energy drink. Sargento released Shareables cheese and cracker snackers. Biscoff created vanilla ice cream infused with crushed Biscoff cookies.

articles.title: L'Oreal, Shark, Medicube and More Beauty Faves Are up to 40% off Ahead of Amazon Prime Day
articles.summary: Amazon is starting Prime Day on July 8th with early beauty deals. Customers can find discounts up to 40% on skincare, makeup, hair care, and personal care products. The promotion includes best-selling items and TikTok-approved products.

articles.title: Will Ad Agencies Survive The AI Era? Baidu And Meta Say No
articles.author: Michael Ashley
articles.summary: Meta aims to fully automate the creation, targeting, and deployment of digital ads using AI. Kalshi premiered a marketing video produced entirely by AI. AMC Networks partnered with Runway, using its AI technology to ease access to scenes and generate pictures for promotional use.

articles.title: Paren Announces Advisory Board Members, Including Gabe Klein, Former Director of the U.S. Joint Office ...
articles.author: Victoria Advocate
articles.summary: A charging data firm is expanding its market presence. The company launched new standardized data services. The company also launched a real-time API.

articles.title: With FDA nod, cell-grown salmon headed for an SF restaurant
articles.author: Patrick Hoge
articles.summary: Wildtype, a startup specializing in cell-grown salmon, has received a 'no questions' letter from the FDA regarding its production system. This clearance allows Wildtype to proceed with plans to sell its cultured salmon through restaurants.

articles.title: Aldi brings back iconic $6.99 garden accessory that immediately gets your backyard ready for summer
articles.author: Fabulous Digital Writer
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a new garden gnome figurine for $6.99, available online and in stores. They are also offering a Bronze Finish Solar Fire Bowl and a hand-held zapper racket for $5.99 which eliminates flying insects.

articles.title: Hyde and Sleep mattress review: magic or money pit?
articles.author: Strategic Partnerships Lead
articles.summary: Dreams launched the Hyde & Sleep Deluxe Ice Memory Foam Mattress, starting at £949. The mattress features five layers including a cooling cover, memory foam pods, and airflow foam. It is available on Dreams' website and in its stores.

articles.title: ChatGPT ONL – The fastest way to use AI, without registration
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: ChatGPT ONL has launched 'ChatGPT Online Nederlands,' a free and easy-to-use chatbot specifically for Dutch-speaking users. Powered by OpenAI's GPT-4.1 mini, the service provides access to advanced AI language models without requiring accounts or personal data, offering a versatile tool for content creation, brainstorming, and translation.

articles.title: I found the best early Prime Day beauty deals to shop now starting from just $5
articles.author: Sophie Shaw
articles.summary: Amazon is offering early Prime Day deals on various beauty products. These include markdowns on brands like Shark (FlexStyle Air Styling and Drying System), Medicube (Collagen Jelly Cream), Blue Lizard (SPF 50+ Sport Mineral Sunscreen Spray), RoC (Retinol Line-Smoothing Eye Cream), Olaplex (No. 4 Fine Bond Maintenance Shampoo), CeraVe (Skin Renewing Night Cream), L'Oréal Paris (Lumi Le Glow Skin Tint), Viviscal (Thickening Shampoo), Color Wow (Money Mist), Revlon (ColorStay Crème Eyeshadow), Maskiss (24K Gold Under-Eye Masks), Eight Saints (Firm Intentions Anti-Aging Neck Cream), Starface (Hydro-Stars), Garnier (Mattifying Micellar Water), and Seven Minerals (Organic Castor Oil). The deals are available for a limited time.

articles.title: INFINITI's New Dawn initiative is driven by purpose and designed for tomorrow
articles.author: Suha Sabith
articles.summary: INFINITI is introducing its "New Dawn" initiative focused on product innovation and customer experience. As part of this initiative, INFINITI launched the all-new QX80 and introduced the INFINITI BEYOND membership program and the company announced the all-electric model Vision Qe concept and an electrified SUV.

articles.title: Chinese man, 30, bets on Labubu doll maker, outperforms 97% of mutual fund peers
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Pop Mart, the creator of the popular Labubu dolls, is identified as a company with breakthrough products, innovative sales channels and visually appealing products. A fund manager's investment strategy focuses on companies like Pop Mart that resonate with Gen Z due to their innovative and visually appealing products.

articles.title: I've Tried Hundreds Of Vibrators. This Is The Only One You Need.
articles.summary: The Finger Vibrator is a compact, pink vibrator priced under $20, available on Amazon. It features 10 different modes, is quiet, and comes with a long-lasting battery, making it a convenient and efficient option.

articles.title: The Paragon Universe Launches Low-Speed Electric Vehicles on Walmart Marketplace, Targeting Underserved Communities with Clean Energy Solutions
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Paragon Universe launched its NVII electric vehicles via Walmart Marketplace on June 30, 2025. The NVII electric vehicles are priced starting under $20,000. The launch signifies the company's goal to provide clean energy and transportation to underserved communities.

articles.title: Sezzle Unveils Smarter Shopping Tools to Meet Rising Consumer Expectations
articles.summary: Sezzle Inc. launched a suite of new features, including Sezzle Balance, Express Checkout (beta), and a Browser Extension (beta), aimed at helping consumers navigate financial pressures. These features are designed to streamline the user experience, simplify repayments, and provide savings while shopping. Sezzle also enhanced its in-app experience with a Products Tab and Wishlist to improve product discovery and deal surfacing.

articles.title: Devastated Nintendo fans: Receipts stapled into their Switch 2 screens
articles.author: showbizzdaily.com
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched an updated version of the Nintendo Switch after eight years. This new version of the handheld console is more modern and powerful, but it is also expensive.

articles.title: Next's £24 summer dress that 'won't date' flies off the shelves
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: Next introduced the Twist Short Sleeved T-Shirt Summer Dress, available in multiple colors. New Look offers a Cotton Midi Smock Dress and a Yellow Floral Print Flutter Sleeve Midi Dress, while Marks & Spencer features a Pure Cotton Striped Mini T-Shirt Dress. Nobody's Child has a trending Navy Polka Dot Lyne Midi Dress.

articles.title: How flagship earbuds are changing the wireless audio market
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: boAt is launching its Nirvana series earbuds, including the Nirvana Ion ANC Pro and Nirvana Crystl, which offer features such as Hi-Res Audio, active noise cancellation (ANC), and extended battery life up to 100 hours. The Nirvana Crystl model also features a modern design with a transparent case and Spatial Audio. The company aims to provide flagship features at mid-range pricing.

articles.title: Leaked Google Photos Tool Could Reduce What You Pay
articles.author: Paul Monckton
articles.summary: Google Photos is preparing to introduce a feature that automatically suggests photos users might want to delete. This feature, triggered when users bulk-delete photos, utilizes AI to identify blurry, duplicate, or low-quality images, thereby helping users manage their storage and potentially save money on Google One subscriptions.

articles.title: Hangzhou sends Chinese products globally with innovative cross-border e-commerce services
articles.summary: Qiantang Smart City facilitates Chinese products reaching global markets through innovative e-commerce services. Livestreaming companies offer sales expertise which broadened from cosmetics and home goods to new energy vehicles and photovoltaic modules. Moreover, a company in Qiantang Smart City is using big data to create catwalk videos showcasing virtual models wearing clients' clothing, which allows them to produce a marketing video in just five minutes.

articles.title: Zizzi Marlow debuts new look after a stunning transformation
articles.author: Community Contributor
articles.summary: Zizzi Marlow reopened after refurbishment with a new look and has launched a new Standout Summer menu. The new menu includes dishes such as the Diavoletta Bombe, a spicy take on Zizzi's garlic bombe, and King Prawn Vongole, a fresh pasta dish. They have also released new summer sundaes such as Dragon Fruit & Wild Strawberry Sundae and Caramello Sundae.

articles.title: Review of OnePlus 13s: The Compact Powerhouse You've Been Waiting For?
articles.author: Expertise. With A Talent
articles.summary: OnePlus introduced the 13s, a compact smartphone featuring a 6.32-inch display, Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, and a 5850mAh battery with 80W SuperVOOC charging. The phone runs on OxygenOS 15 based on Android 15 and includes AI features like an AI eraser for photos.

articles.title: Element Brooklyn Brings Luxury Fragrance to the Cleaning Aisle
articles.author: Element Brooklyn
articles.summary: Element Brooklyn is expanding into the cleaning supply category with its new All Purpose Cleaner in Mandarin Crush. This new product features a scent inspired by Aesop's "resurrection" scent and is designed with sustainability in mind, offering a reusable bottle and refillable concentrate bags.

articles.title: How AI In Medical Writing Will Save Money And Accelerate Drug Delivery
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: LogicFlo, a startup, promises to use AI to deliver compliant content. This service aims to free up life sciences professionals for more value-additive tasks.

articles.title: Lenovo Yoga Tab Plus with 3K display confirmed to launch in India; specs revealed on Amazon
articles.summary: Lenovo India is launching the Lenovo Yoga Tab Plus, featuring a 12.7-inch 3K display with a 144Hz refresh rate and powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset. The tablet, equipped with 16GB RAM and UFS 4.0 storage, includes on-device AI capabilities like Lenovo AI Now and Lenovo AI Live Transcript, along with support for the Lenovo Tab Pen Pro and a two-in-one keyboard pack.

articles.title: Most advanced home robot vacuums in 2025 that you can't miss
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: Roborock launched the Saros Z70 with a retractable arm for picking up objects. Dreame introduced the X50 Ultra Complete featuring extendable legs for overcoming thresholds. Eureka released the J15 Max Ultra that detects even transparent water spills. Posha released Kitchen Robot, a kitchen robot that can chops, stirs, and cooks by itself.

articles.title: NatWest paying £175 into certain bank accounts over summer
articles.author: James Rodger
articles.summary: NatWest is offering a £125 bonus for customers who switch their current account to a qualifying Select or Reward account online or through the app. An additional £50 bonus is available if the customer also opens a Digital Regular Saver account. The promotion aims to attract new customers by providing financial incentives for switching to NatWest.

articles.title: Newegg Kicks Off 4th of July Sale with FantasTech Price Protection on Early Tech Deals
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Newegg launched its 4th of July Sale and Canada Day Sale, initiating its 11th annual FantasTech sales event, which provides access to early tech deals. The sale includes FantasTech Price Protection, offering refunds on qualifying products if their price drops later during the FantasTech event. Many tech products such as desktop PCs, laptops, PC components, storage, peripherals, and gaming gear are on sale.

articles.title: Newegg Kicks Off 4th of July Sale with FantasTech Price Protection on Early Tech Deals
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Newegg Commerce, Inc. launched its 4th of July Sale and Canada Day Sale on June 30, marking the start of its 11th annual FantasTech sales event. The sale, running until July 6, features numerous early tech deals, many of which are backed by the FantasTech Price Protection program, which for the first time, is extending beyond the core sale period.

articles.title: 'It will challenge a lot of ways of working' – Nomad Foods talks new start-up programme
articles.author: Dean Best
articles.summary: Nomad Foods, through its 'Future Foods Lab' initiative, is partnering with start-ups to introduce new frozen food products across Europe. The initial focus is on functional nutrition, with an emphasis on clean labels and sustainable sourcing. The program aims to identify breakthrough innovation ideas and bring them to commercial viability through collaboration and financial stability.

articles.title: 33 Ordinary Products That Will Change Your Life
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff launched their new "Sqeezy" set, which combines their popular cleaning paste with a versatile cleaning sponge for cleaning. This new product aims to tackle grease and mildew, receiving positive reviews.

articles.title: Learn to edit and create professional-looking videos with minimal effort
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: Canvid, an AI-powered video creation and screen recording platform, simplifies video production for business users. It offers features like one-click screen recording, automatic zoom, and real-time voice enhancement. This new product is available for Windows and Mac as a one-time purchase with lifetime access and unlimited video exports.

articles.title: Alibaba releases Qwen-VLo, its latest AI image model rivaling OpenAI's GPT-4o
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Alibaba has launched Qwen-VLo, a new AI image generation model with enhanced context understanding and image generation capabilities. This model offers more detailed images with greater accuracy compared to previous Alibaba models and supports multiple languages. Qwen-VLo is currently in the preview stage and incorporates features like multiple image input and dynamic resolution training.

articles.title: Score a Discount on Covey, Stripes Beauty and More Celebrity Brands From Shop TODAY Stages
articles.author: Lauren Witonsky
articles.summary: Leesa is offering 35% off its Sapira Hybrid Mattress. Homecourt features a cleaning trio for the kitchen. Asics promotes high-cushioned sneakers. Stripes Beauty offers a face serum designed to firm, hydrate, and plump the skin. CORT provides furniture and decor rental services with a discount of 50% off the first month's rent on a 6-month lease. Winston Flowers offers 10% off the Summer Collection.

articles.title: Lava redefines smart choices with ‘Brand Ki Nahi, Brain Ki Suno'
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Lava has launched a new campaign promoting its Storm Play 5G smartphone, which is available on Amazon for ₹9,999. The phone features a MediaTek Dimensity 7050 processor, a 120Hz refresh rate, a 50MP Sony sensor, and a clean Android 15 experience.

articles.title: Google wants to compensate for traffic drop in the media with Offerwall
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Google has launched Offerwall, a new monetization product for publishers using Google Ad Manager. This product enables users to access content by engaging in actions like micropayments, viewing ads, answering surveys, or subscribing to newsletters. Beta testing has shown some publishers experiencing revenue increases and additional impressions using Offerwall.

articles.title: Spinneys Opens A New Store in Hurghada
articles.author: Daily News Egypt
articles.summary: Spinneys has opened a new store in the Al-Kawthar district of Hurghada, Egypt, marking their 33rd store overall. The store offers a variety of products and home delivery service via Spinneys' website and mobile app. Spinneys has launched four new branches since the beginning of the year and will inaugurate a fifth store next week in Sahl Hasheesh, with five additional openings scheduled before the end of 2025.

articles.title: Huge Android update tomorrow to be unveiled at Unpacked event in New York
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Nothing is set to unveil its new smartphone, the Nothing Phone 3, at an event on July 1st, featuring a potential "Glyph Matrix" design and a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 processor. The company is also expected to introduce its first over-ear headphones, expanding its product lineup beyond earbuds.

articles.title: 5 upgrades expected with OnePlus Nord 5
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch the OnePlus Nord 5, featuring a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chip and a large 7,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging. The phone will include a 144 FPS display, a redesigned vertically-aligned camera module, and 50-megapixel sensors for both front and rear cameras.

articles.title: Perfetti's Centerfruit uses AI voice tech to engage rural consumers without internet
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Perfetti Van Melle India launched the 'Kaisi Jeebh Laplapayi' campaign for Centerfruit, enabling real-time AI conversations over feature phones without internet. Users can participate in a tongue twister competition and ask questions in local dialects. This campaign is designed to reach rural consumers and revive Centerfruit's iconic tagline.

articles.title: Centerfruit Launches GenAI Tongue Twister Challenge to Engage Rural India
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Perfetti Van Melle India, with its brand Centerfruit, has launched the 'Centerfruit Tongue Twister Challenge,' a GenAI campaign targeting rural Uttar Pradesh. This voice-based campaign, developed in partnership with WPP, BharatGPT.ai, and utilizing Google Cloud technology, allows users to engage without internet access. It transforms traditional brand engagement into an enjoyable experience by leveraging regional dialects.

articles.title: Aldi offering a 'sand proof' beach blanket for summer and it's less than £7
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a range of new beach essentials, including a Sand-Free Blanket priced at £6.99, Changing Robes for adults (£39.99) and children (£29.99), and a Haul It All Tote Bag for £12.99. The products are available in stores nationwide from July 6.

articles.title: Ice cream is delicious and creamy if made with 1 cupboard ingredient
articles.author: Rebecca Koncienzcy
articles.summary: Nutella launched a new ice cream product that incorporates the rich flavor of the chocolate spread. The Nutella Ice Cream has a nutty flavour and is silky smooth and has a crispy chocolate layer. The tub retails for £5.50 for 470ml, but Morrisons has an offer for £3.50.

articles.title: TECNO Spark Go 2 Goes on Sale July 1 — Big on Features, Premium Design, Light on the Pocket
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: TECNO launched its new Spark Go 2 smartphone in India on July 1, priced at Rs. 6,999. The phone features TECNO's AI assistant Ella, a 6.67' punch-hole HD+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate, IP64 dust and water resistance, and the Free Link App for calls without a mobile signal.

articles.title: ImgGood AI: Unleashing Authentic Creativity with Effortless Image Editing
articles.summary: Quand Limited launched ImgGood AI Image Editor, an AI-driven tool designed to simplify image editing for users of all skill levels. ImgGood offers features like background removal, image enhancement, and face swapping, allowing for professional-quality results without technical expertise, which is useful for social media content, e-commerce visuals, and personal photo editing. Users can access ImgGood via the official website.

articles.title: SD Gundam G Generation Eternal: New Units Released
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: SD Gundam G Generation Eternal introduces new units like RX-93 ν Gundam (Hyper Mega Bazooka Launcher), a long-range attacker, and MSN-04 Sazabi (Heavy Arms Type), designed for close-quarters combat. The update also includes Gundam Exia Repair III with improved durability and attack, and Unicorn Gundam (Perfectibility) with enhanced mobility and powerful change abilities. These units have unique abilities and characteristics impacting team composition and battle strategies.

articles.title: HUL moves 40% of ad spends to digital, strengthens tech-led consumer strategy
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Hindustan Unilever (HUL) launched Stratos, a new skincare technology that took five years to develop and is backed by over 20 patents.  This launch reflects HUL's tech-led product development, grounded in deep consumer insights and dermatological science. The company is also increasing its focus on digital marketing.

articles.title: I'm a college intern — this is how I'm getting 10% back on Prime Day deals
articles.author: nypost
articles.summary: Amazon is providing exclusive offers and limited-time deals, including free same-day shipping and bonus cash-back boosters. Customers can save up to 50% on college and dorm essentials from brands like Command, Levoit, and Brita. Amazon also offers an extra 5% cash back on beauty, electronics, apparel, and personal care purchases during Prime Day, totaling 10%.

articles.title: Zoom: Marbella's Fast and Reliable Drinks Delivery
articles.author: Alfonso Portabales
articles.summary: Zoom Drinks Delivery launched in Marbella, Spain, offering speedy delivery of alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. The service targets residents, holidaymakers, and trade clients, providing a range of drinks from soft drinks to spirits, accessible via an app with features like real-time order tracking and age verification.

articles.title: Centerfruit's AI voice challenge connects with rural India without the internet
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Perfetti Van Melle India, in collaboration with WPP, BharatGPT.ai, and Google Cloud, launched the 'Centerfruit Tongue Twister Challenge,' a voice-based GenAI campaign targeting rural Uttar Pradesh. This campaign allows users to participate in tongue-twister challenges via feature phones, providing an AI-powered entertainment experience without requiring internet access, directly engaging them in their local dialects.

articles.title: I'm a college intern — this is how I'm getting 10% back on Prime Day deals
articles.author: Charlotte Finch
articles.summary: Amazon has re-launched "Prime for Young Adults," a membership program exclusively for 18 to 24-year-olds. The service offers a 6-month free trial, followed by a discounted monthly or yearly fee, and includes benefits like fast shipping, Prime Video, exclusive savings, cash back on electronics, beauty, apparel, and personal care, and early access to Prime Day deals.

articles.title: Samsung to Launch New Foldables on July 9 in New York
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will launch its next generation of foldable devices with Galaxy AI on July 9 in Brooklyn, New York. These devices feature an AI-powered interface supported by advanced hardware. The launch will be part of the Galaxy Unpacked event.

articles.title: New Look's 'stunning' £27 midi dress is 'really flattering'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: New Look launched its Khaki Green Flutter Sleeve Button Front Midi Dress, priced at £26.99 (reduced from £29.99), and it is available in khaki, black, and green. The midi dress features woven fabric, a V-neck, short flutter sleeves, side slit pockets, and a button front, receiving positive reviews for its comfort and versatility.

articles.title: New Look's 'gorgeous' £27 midi dress is 'perfect for summer'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: New Look has introduced the Khaki Green Flutter Sleeve Button Front Midi Dress, priced at £26.99 (reduced from £29.99) and available in khaki, black, and green. The dress features woven fabric, a relaxed silhouette, a V-neck, and short flutter sleeves, with side slit pockets and a button front.

articles.title: SCS Butter Celebrates 120 Years of Dazzling Kitchens Across Singapore
articles.author: PR Newswire Asia
articles.summary: SCS Butter is launching a "Create Your Dazzle" campaign to celebrate its 120th anniversary. The campaign includes limited-edition packaging inspired by Singapore's cultural celebrations, a social media campaign, influencer collaborations and in-store experiences to promote SCS Butter and inspire creativity with food.

articles.title: 45 Travel Products That'll Have You Triple-Checking The Price
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: This article presents a variety of new travel-related products. These products range from travel bags and organizers to personal care items like a Neutrogena sunscreen stick and an Alleyoop 3-in-1 travel razor, catering to needs for space-saving, convenience, and personal care while traveling. Also, I Dew Care launched "Tap Secret" mattifying powder shampoo.

articles.title: A scientific and technological leap from '0' to '1'
org: Shanghai Grand neoBay Technology Development Co., Ltd
articles.summary: JAKA Robotics, developed at Grand neoBay, independently developed and designed key components such as encoders, servo drives, and control systems, achieving in-house R&D and production for 90 percent of its parts. Grand neoBay focuses on incubating tech-driven startups and integrating innovation, capital, and industrial chains to support the development of high-quality innovation projects.

articles.title: Amazon UAE launches new Bazaar platform with products starting at $1.09
articles.author: Sharon Benjamin
articles.summary: Amazon UAE launched Amazon Bazaar, a new shopping experience within the Amazon.ae mobile app, targeting customers seeking value products. The platform features products priced mostly at AED 25 or below and offers promotions like 25% off during the launch period and tiered savings for larger purchases. The company plans to roll out access to all customers within the coming weeks.

articles.title: New Look's 'really flattering' £27 midi dress is a 'wardrobe essential'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: New Look introduced the Khaki Green Flutter Sleeve Button Front Midi Dress, now on sale for £26.99. The dress is available in black and green, featuring a comfortable woven fabric, relaxed fit, V-neck, short flutter sleeves, side slit pockets, and a button front closure.

articles.title: Business Reporter: Improving the quality of AI-driven Customer Experience (CX) platform
articles.summary: Gladly explains that legacy systems with bolt-on AI are failing customer service standards. Gladly offers a CX AI platform that embeds AI into the customer journey, combining conversational, agentic, and contextual intelligence capabilities, enabling businesses to scale loyalty through customer context.

articles.title: Hisense Showcases AI Technology Strength with "AI YOUR LIFE" Message at FIFA Club World Cup 2025™
articles.summary: Hisense is showcasing its AI leadership and integrating intelligent features across its product portfolio. At the core is the Hi-View AI Engine X, their most powerful AI processor. This engine powers the next generation of ULED AI TVs and expands smart connectivity in the home through ConnectLife, including the PureFlat Smart Series refrigerator.

articles.title: Hisense Showcases AI Technology Strength with 'AI YOUR LIFE' Message at FIFA Club World Cup 2025™
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: Hisense is showcasing its AI leadership by integrating intelligent features across its product portfolio, highlighted by the Hi-View AI Engine X which powers the ULED AI TVs with AI Picture, AI Sound, AI Scenario, and AI Energy features. Furthermore, Hisense expands smart connectivity through ConnectLife including PureFlat Smart Series refrigerator.

articles.title: Focus On Breakfast & Brunch: 2 August
articles.author: Rob Brown
articles.summary: The article focuses on innovation in the breakfast market and plans to profile eight new breakfast products or ranges that haven't been featured in The Grocer before. The article emphasizes the need for launch dates, recommended selling price, and high-resolution images of each product.

articles.title: Amazon Bazaar launches in UAE; products as low as Dhs4
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new service called 'Amazon Bazaar' within its Amazon.ae app, offering affordable products priced mostly at Dhs25 or less. The service, currently in beta for select UAE users, features a user-friendly interface, volume discounts, and reliable delivery and returns, with a full rollout expected soon.

articles.title: Baidu to Open Source ERNIE AI Model, Shaking Up Global AI Arena
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Baidu has announced the open-sourcing of its ERNIE generative AI model. This move aims to empower developers with accessible AI tools, potentially disrupting the pricing landscape dominated by companies like OpenAI and Anthropic. Earlier in March, Baidu claimed that its latest model, ERNIE X1, could match DeepSeek's R1 in performance while costing half as much.

articles.title: 7UP gets its 1st-ever sonic logo: What does it mean?
articles.summary: PepsiCo's 7UP brand has introduced its inaugural sonic logo in India, aiming to create a multisensory brand experience. Featuring sounds like a can opening and fizzing, coupled with a melody designed to evoke refreshment, the sonic logo was developed in partnership with BrandMusiq and will first be introduced in Bengaluru.

articles.title: Hero Vida VX2 to launch tomorrow: Know what to expect
articles.summary: Hero MotoCorp is set to launch the Vida VX2 electric scooter under the Vida sub-brand on July 1, designed as a budget-friendly alternative to the Vida V2. Additionally, the Vida brand will roll out a new Battery-as-a-Service (BaaS) model from July 1, 2025, offering subscription-based battery options to reduce the initial cost of EV ownership.

articles.title: Open air cafe, store with cosmetics, jewelry for girls among new NJ businesses
articles.author: Daniel Munoz
articles.summary: Optimum opened an interactive retail store on June 9 in Morris Township where patrons can register for services and shop for devices. Paris Baguette had a grand opening of an open-air cafe on June 14 in Rockaway that offers fresh-baked goods and coffee. Claire's opened a new location on May 23 in American Dream, East Rutherford that offers products for girls of all ages.

articles.title: Top Body Care Products for Smooth, Glowing & Nourished Skin
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: The Bath Store introduced British Rose Body Wash for tan removal. MCaffeine offers Coffee Body Scrub and Choco Body Butter. Dot & Key launched Watermelon SuperGlow Facial Gel Cleanser. These products are available on Myntra with discounts from June 25th to June 30th.

articles.title: Are we already paying for "Free" AI photography? The hidden costs of generative AI laid bare
articles.author: Rod Lawton
articles.summary: Topaz Labs is offering Cloud Credits for cloud-based AI processing in its Photo AI software. Adobe's Firefly 4 model requires a paid Premium subscription for generative video, with a limited number of credits provided with the Photography Plan and Lightroom plan. ON1 Software builds in an optional Stability AI subscription for enhanced Generative AI results.

articles.title: Nykaa stock nears 52-week high: Will the rally continue? Here's what brokerages say
articles.author: Pranati Deva
articles.summary: Nykaa launched Nykaa Now, a quick commerce platform for beauty products, which promises deliveries within 30 to 120 minutes and is currently operational in seven cities. Nykaa also plans several marquee product launches in the second half of FY26 to bolster growth across its BPC and fashion segments.

articles.title: Samsung Launches AI-Powered Home Appliances In India With Price Starting At Rs 24,500
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 Bespoke AI home appliance collection in India, featuring products like the Bespoke AI Laundry Combo, French Door Refrigerator, WindFree Air Conditioner, and Top Load Washer. These appliances integrate with Samsung's SmartThings platform and utilize AI for features like fabric detection, energy efficiency, and smart home control. The collection is available through Samsung Exclusive Stores, Samsung.com, and major e-commerce platforms across India.

articles.title: "Start small, and understand deeply." In September, the global startup festival "Try Everything," co..
articles.author: Yeon Gyu-Wook
articles.summary: Ironclad, an AI legal technology company, offers a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform that digitally manages contracts from creation to analysis. Its core product, AI Assistant, prepares contract drafts based on learned standards and policies, potentially increasing negotiation speed by up to 20 times. The company advises startups to focus on a clear and narrow market to achieve leadership and impact.

articles.title: LG's Advanced Refrigerator Technology Delivers Superior Summer Performance When It Matters Most
articles.summary: LG Electronics is promoting its French door refrigerators, including the new MoodUP™ refrigerator. The MoodUP™ model features customizable LED door panels with over 170,000 color combinations and integrated Bluetooth speakers. LG's French door refrigerators incorporate technologies like DoorCooling+™, LINEARCooling™, and Smart Diagnosis™ to ensure freshness and efficiency.

articles.title: Xiaomi YU7 electric SUV receives 300,000+ orders in just 72 hours
articles.author: Asianet Newsable English
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched its new electric SUV, the YU7, which has received over 300,000 pre-orders within 72 hours. The YU7 has a starting price of 253,000 yuan and is available in three variants: YU7, YU7 Pro, and YU7 Max, each with different battery capacities and ranges.

articles.title: After DeepSeek, China's Baidu to open source its Ernie AI chatbot
articles.summary: Baidu is set to open source its Ernie generative AI model, beginning with a gradual rollout starting Monday. This move is intended to empower developers by providing access to a powerful model without the constraints of cost or development tools and could challenge the pricing strategies of companies like OpenAI and Anthropic.

articles.title: Henkel Consumer Brands Launches Schwarzkopf Gliss Range in GCC Markets
articles.summary: Henkel Consumer Brands has launched the Schwarzkopf Gliss Hair Care range in GCC markets. The launch featured an event at the Bvlgari Hotel & Resort, showcasing interactive experiences and cosmetic technology. The Schwarzkopf Gliss products incorporate Liquid Hair-Repair Technology with liquid keratin, aimed at repairing damaged hair.

articles.title: Brizy Launches Brizy Shops: Design Your Dream Online Store, Code-Free
articles.summary: Brizy launched Brizy Shops, a new Cloud add-on for e-commerce, integrated with Ecwid. Brizy Shops enables users to build and manage online stores. Launch pricing discounts are available for a limited time on all Brizy Shops plans.

articles.title: JNR Flux Pro with NIPLO Tech: Elevate Your Vaping with 50% More Efficiency
articles.author: JNR
articles.summary: JNR, a leading e-cigarette brand, launched the JNR Flux Pro, a next-generation vape. The JNR Flux Pro is powered by NIPLO Tech and enhances vaporization efficiency by 50%, offering smoother, more flavorful puffs while significantly reducing harmful byproducts.

articles.title: Skincare under ₹499 at Amazon: Get beautiful, glowing skin without splurging; Lotions, serums, creams, and more
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of skincare products available on Amazon for under ₹499. These include cleansers from Neutrogena, serums from Minimalist and The Derma Co., toners from Plum and Khadi Natural, lotion from mCaffeine and Simple, and sunscreen from Aqualogica and DOT & KEY. Each product description details ingredients and their benefits for various skin types.

articles.title: Nykaa's premium bet: A smart strategy if it delivers
articles.author: Manvi Agarwal
articles.summary: Nykaa is expanding its two-hour delivery service, 'Nykaa Now,' to seven metros and supporting it with an extensive network of warehouses and rapid hubs for same- or next-day delivery. Nykaa also plans to scale its physical reach across tier 2 and tier 3 markets, increasing store count from 237 to over 500 by FY30.

articles.title: Samsung May Unveil New Triple-Folding Smartphone At July 9 Event
articles.author: Tasneem Kanchwala
articles.summary: Samsung is rumored to unveil a new tri-fold smartphone alongside the confirmed Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 at its upcoming Summer Galaxy event. This potential launch is speculated as a move to compete with Huawei's Mate XT Ultimate in the triple folding smartphone market. Pre-reservations are already available for the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 in India.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy M36 launched in India with 50MP OIS triple rare camera, 5000mAh battery — here's what you need to know
articles.author: Priya Vishwakarma
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy M36 5G in India on June 30, targeting young consumers with AI innovations and features like a 50MP OIS triple camera and Corning Gorilla Glass Victus+ protection. The Galaxy M36 5G features a 6.7' Full HD+ Super AMOLED display and is available in three colors, with sales starting July 12, 2025, across Samsung's website, Amazon, and select retail stores.

articles.title: Mahindra Scorpio N completes 3 years: Why it remains a top SUV pick in India
articles.author: HT Auto Desk
articles.summary: Mahindra Scorpio-N now features Level 2 ADAS equipped with 10 safety features, specifically on its top-spec Z8L variant. This update arrives three years after the SUV's launch in June 2022.

articles.title: Luxor Schneider unveils ‘For The All-Rounder In You' campaign for LX Max Pens
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Luxor Schneider, in partnership with Born Hi, has launched a new campaign, 'For The All-Rounder In You,' to promote the LX Max Pen. The campaign highlights the pen as a reliable tool for students' academic and creative tasks, showcasing its consistent performance throughout the day.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tri-Fold Device To Be Unveiled At July 9 Event? Here's What We Know
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7, the Galaxy Watch 8 series, and a new Galaxy Buds model at an event on July 9 in New York. The company might also unveil its first tri-fold device, potentially named Galaxy G Fold, featuring a 9.96-inch foldable primary display and a 6.49-inch cover display, which folds inward, unlike Huawei's Z-shaped Mate XT.

articles.title: Engaging Commercial Video Production for Brand Impact
articles.summary: Brand Artistry offers commercial video production and video editing services in Singapore. These services help businesses boost marketing efforts and gain traction across digital platforms by creating compelling content, showcasing services, and building brand narratives.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics announced on the 30th that its 2025 "Bespoke AI Combo" all-in-one washing dryer ..
articles.author: Park Seung Ju
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched its 2025 'Bespoke AI Combo' all-in-one washing dryer, which received the highest 'Diamond' rating in IoT security from UL Solutions for the second consecutive year. This new model features enhanced AI capabilities, a touch screen, Bixby voice assistant, and improved security measures through Samsung's Knox security solution.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5, OnePlus Nord CE 5 to launch on July 8
articles.author: Asianet Newsable English
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching two new smartphones, the Nord 5 and Nord CE 5, on July 8th via Amazon India. The Nord 5 features a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset and a Sony LYT-700 sensor for its camera, while the Nord CE 5 includes a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate chipset and a 50MP main camera.

articles.title: Singapore's online durian vendors spike up competition with traditional stores
articles.author: Vn Express
articles.summary: Durian Delivery Singapore is providing online durian sales, including free replacements for bad fruit and free delivery for orders above SGD100. Royal Durian has been selling durians online for six years and faces a crowded market. Dukrian differentiates itself by sourcing durians directly from plantations and utilizes e-commerce and delivery apps like Grab.

articles.title: EOFY Sale 2025: 50% off Dyson's V8 Vacuum Cleaner
articles.author: Rosalyn Fannin
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a sale on its V8 Vacuum cleaner, now available for $395 (originally $799). The Dyson V8 features a fast motor for strong suction, a Motorbar cleaner head for hair removal, and multiple cleaning heads for various surfaces. It also offers up to 40 minutes of continuous power and a convenient ejection mechanism for emptying.

articles.title: From Labubu to Gentle Monster, cross-market headway for Korea and China relies on national nonidentity
articles.summary: Miniso relaunched in Korea focusing on character merchandise tied to global IPs and aims to achieve 20 billion won in revenue from 10 stores. Pop Mart is also expanding in Korea with collectible figures, experiencing significant revenue growth. Roborock has dominated the Korean market with its robot vacuums, demonstrating success through superior design and technology.

articles.title: 33 Products For Those Annoying Summertime Problems
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The article presents a range of new products and solutions for summer-related issues. These include items such as towel bands, weeders, sweat-absorbing bra liners, and anti-chafing thigh bands addressing discomfort and maintenance challenges.

articles.title: Five new skincare and beauty products we swear by for a healthy glam look!
articles.author: Srushti Kulkarni
articles.summary: Maybelline New York launched Sunkisser Highlighter & Blush, a 2-in-1 product for radiant glow. Raise On introduced Cloud 9, an ampoule-to-cream hair treatment for clarifying the scalp. Nykaa unveiled Lolli Lips pH Colour Changing Lip Tint Lipstick, a moisturizing formula enriched with shea butter and vitamin E. Shankara launched Bhringraj Tailam, a natural scalp and hair oil. Luar introduced Luminous Veil Liquid Foundation for diverse Indian skin tones.

articles.title: "Can Artificial Intelligence (AI) run a 'real' store?"Anthropic, an AI startup, has turned this simp..
articles.author: Wonho-seop
articles.summary: Anthropic launched an experimental AI-managed store named Claudius, run by its Claude Sonnet 3.7 language model. Claudius handled tasks from inventory management to customer interaction, exploring AI's potential in small business operations. Despite failing to make a profit due to over-discounting, Anthropic plans further experiments to enhance AI's practicality and self-improvement capabilities.

articles.title: New Look's 'vibrant' £22 beach dress is 'lightweight and comfortable'
articles.author: What's On Writer
articles.summary: New Look offers the Textured Beaded Strap Beach Maxi Dress for £21.59 and Faux Leather Cut Out Strap Mules for £12.99. Next retails the Textured Beaded Summer Maxi Dress for £32, while ASOS features the Vero Moda Chuck On Cami Maxi Dress for £20. These new products are available for purchase online.

articles.title: Alpenliebe, Happydent & Center Fresh—How Perfetti Van Melle Its Keeps Iconic Brands Fresh
articles.author: Tsunami Costabir
articles.summary: Perfetti Van Melle India (PVM) is evolving its product lines to appeal to Gen Z. Alpenliebe is experimenting with new formats like dual-layer jellies, Chupa Chups is introducing a sour jelly line with quirky shapes, and Mentos is engaging youth culture through digital activations. PVM leverages e-commerce and quick commerce for testing new bundles, formats, and price points.

articles.title: Nothing Phone (3) and Headphone (1) launching on July 1: All specs, expected price and more
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Nothing will launch Phone (3), its first flagship smartphone, and Headphone (1), its first over-ear headphones, at a launch event in London on July 1. The London-based tech company is unveiling these two new products.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 India launch in 1 week: Expected price and specs
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its Nord product in India within a week. Price and specs information is anticipated.

articles.title: Reimagining Retail With AI And Edge Computing
articles.author: Samir Sandesara
articles.summary: Dell introduces Dell NativeEdge and Dell AI Factory with NVIDIA to help retail organizations securely scale their infrastructure and orchestrate AI applications. Dell NativeEdge offers zero-touch deployment for edge environments, while Dell AI Factory with NVIDIA delivers real-time video analytics and consumer insights, aiming to streamline operations and personalize customer experiences.

articles.title: This dress shirt from Mizzen+Main is so comfortable and stretchy that it feels like an ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Mizzen+Main, a performance workwear brand, offers dress shirts made with four-way stretch material. These shirts are designed to resist wrinkles and wick moisture, with prices starting at $138.

articles.title: Tesco's 'gorgeous' �25 midi dress 'feels so nice and expensive'
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Tesco's F&F Clothing is introducing a new dress that has garnered positive attention from customers, who describe it as feeling 'expensive'. This indicates a new product offering from the brand.

articles.title: Mercedes-Benz set to drop controversial hybrid engine
articles.author: Stuff
articles.summary: AMG plans to introduce a hybrid replacement for its V8 engine. This decision was made because the previous model failed to resonate with traditional customers.

articles.title: Kizik Launches Pop-Up Tour To Drive Hands-Free Footwear Expansion
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Kizik, a footwear brand, is launching the Kizik Try-On Tour in July. The Try-On Tour is a new retail initiative.

articles.title: What do young Americans say about China's NEV?
articles.author: 叶雨婷
articles.summary: Young Americans are impressed with China's New Energy Vehicles (NEVs), citing their cost-effectiveness and features like massage functions and advanced sound systems. These experiences lead some to prefer them over Tesla.

articles.title: Google launches Doppl app
articles.summary: Google launched a new experimental app called Doppl. The app uses artificial intelligence to show users how different outfits might look on them. Doppl is available on iOS and Android.
